pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Social Media Search and Analytic Tool // Social media search and analytic tool that takes one or multiple URL(s) and returns the information about the popularity and reach of the URL(s) on social media. The function get_socialmedia() retrieves the number of shares, likes, pins, and hits on Facebook (http://www.facebook.com), Pinterest (http://www.pinterest.com), StumbleUpon (http://www.stumbleupon.com), LinkedIn (http://www.linkedin.com), and Reddit (http://www.reddit.com). The package also includes dedicated functions for each social network platform and a function to resolve shortened URLs.
